java/liquibase/database/sql/AddPrimaryKeyStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.DB2Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.database.MSSQLDatabase;
00006 import liquibase.database.MySQLDatabase;
00007 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00008 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00009 
00010 public class AddPrimaryKeyStatement implements SqlStatement {
00011 
00012     private String schemaName;
00013     private String tableName;
00014     private String tablespace;
00015     private String columnNames;
00016     private String constraintName;
00017 
00018     public AddPrimaryKeyStatement(String schemaName, String tableName, String columnNames, String constraintName) {
00019         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00020         this.tableName = tableName;
00021         this.columnNames = columnNames;
00022         this.constraintName = constraintName;
00023     }
00024 
00025     public String getSchemaName() {
00026         return schemaName;
00027     }
00028 
00029     public String getTableName() {
00030         return tableName;
00031     }
00032 
00033     public String getTablespace() {
00034         return tablespace;
00035     }
00036 
00037     public AddPrimaryKeyStatement setTablespace(String tablespace) {
00038         this.tablespace = tablespace;
00039         return this;
00040     }
00041 
00042     public String getColumnNames() {
00043         return columnNames;
00044     }
00045 
00046     public String getConstraintName() {
00047         return constraintName;
00048     }
00049 
00050     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00051         String sql;
00052         if (getConstraintName() == null  || database instanceof MySQLDatabase) {
00053             sql = "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ADD PRIMARY KEY (" + getColumnNames() + ")";
00054         } else {
00055             sql = "ALTER TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(getSchemaName(), getTableName()) + " ADD CONSTRAINT " + getConstraintName() + " PRIMARY KEY (" + getColumnNames() + ")";
00056         }
00057 
00058         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(getTablespace()) != null && database.supportsTablespaces()) {
00059             if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00060                 sql += " ON "+getTablespace();
00061             } else if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00062                 ; //not supported in DB2
00063             } else {
00064                 sql += " USING INDEX TABLESPACE "+getTablespace();
00065             }
00066         }
00067 
00068         return sql;
00069     }
00070 
00071     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00072         return ";";
00073     }
00074 
00075     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00076         return true;
00077     }
00078 }
